original: @188b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @188b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba dzny'a siddhi k'a ri k'a /
analyzed: sarba dzny'a siddhi k'a ri k'a /
translated: Sarvaj√±ƒÅsiddhikƒÅrikƒÅ

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
translated: The Verses on the Establishment of Omniscience

original: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Omniscient One!

original: de phyir gal te don kun rig / nyes spangs 'ga' zhig yod na ni //
analyzed: de phyir gal te don kun rig / nyes spangs 'ga' zhig yod na ni //
translated: Therefore, if there is anyone who knows all objects and has abandoned faults,

original: de las rig byed don 'grub kyi //
analyzed: de las rig byed don 'grub kyi //
translated: From him, the purpose of the Vedas is accomplished.

original: gzhan du long ba brgyud pa yin //
analyzed: gzhan du long ba brgyud pa yin //
translated: Otherwise, it is like a succession of blind people.

original: thos las shes pa phul phyin dang // ldan pa'i skyes bu yod ces 'byung //
analyzed: thos las shes pa phul phyin dang // ldan pa'i skyes bu yod ces 'byung //
translated: It is said that there exists a person endowed with the best knowledge from hearing.

original: de phyir shes ldan skyes bu kun //
analyzed: de phyir shes ldan skyes bu kun //
translated: Therefore, all wise people

original: mi shes pa dang 'brel pa yin //üîΩ'on te de ni dgongs pa ste //
analyzed: mi shes pa dang 'brel pa yin // 'on te de ni dgongs pa ste //
translated: Are connected with the ignorant.üîΩBut if that is the intention,

original: gzhan du dgongs nas bstan yin na //üîΩde ltar sems pa spangs pa yi //
analyzed: gzhan du dgongs nas bstan yin na // de ltar sems pa spangs pa yi //
translated: And it is taught with a different intention,üîΩHow can there be an intention

original: rtag la ji ltar dgongs pa yin //
analyzed: rtag la ji ltar dgongs pa yin //
translated: For the one who has abandoned such thoughts?

original: gal te rigs pas bsal phyir na //
analyzed: gal te rigs pas bsal phyir na //
translated: If it is because it is refuted by reasoning,

original: thos pa tshad ma ma yin 'gyur //
analyzed: thos pa tshad ma ma yin 'gyur //
translated: Hearing would not be a valid means of knowledge.

original: de phyir mchod sbyin sogs tshig la'ang //
analyzed: de phyir mchod sbyin sogs tshig la'ang //
translated: Therefore, in the case of statements about sacrifices and so on,

original: tshad ma'i rgyun ni ci zhig yod //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rgyun ni ci zhig yod //
translated: What is the continuity of valid knowledge?

original: gal te gang la rigs pa yi //
analyzed: gal te gang la rigs pa yi //
translated: If you accept the Vedas

original: gnod med rig byed de blangs na //üîΩci phyir rigs pas mi gnod pa'i //
analyzed: gnod med rig byed de blangs na // ci phyir rigs pas mi gnod pa'i //
translated: as being unrefuted by reasoning,üîΩwhy do you not accept the words of NƒÅrada,

original: nal bu'i tshig kyang blang mi bya //
analyzed: nal bu'i tshig kyang blang mi bya //
translated: which are not refuted by reasoning?

original: mngon sum min pa'i dgongs rnams la //
analyzed: mngon sum min pa'i dgongs rnams la //
translated: The intentions of those who are not omniscient

original: rigs dang dngos la brten ma yin //
analyzed: rigs dang dngos la brten ma yin //
translated: are neither based on reasoning nor on fact.

original: lung la brten pa yin zhe na //
analyzed: lung la brten pa yin zhe na //
translated: If you say they are based on scripture,

original: de nyid dngos su rtog pa yin //üîΩde phyir thos pa tshad ma na //
analyzed: de nyid dngos su rtog pa yin // de phyir thos pa tshad ma na //
translated: then that is a direct contradiction.üîΩTherefore, the one who is an authority on all topics

original: don kun rig pa'i skyes bu grub //
analyzed: don kun rig pa'i skyes bu grub //
translated: is the one who has heard everything.

original: de spong ba yi glen rnams la /
analyzed: de spong ba yi glen rnams la /
translated: For those fools who reject him,

original: mchod sbyin mtho ris sogs tshig rnams //
analyzed: mchod sbyin mtho ris sogs tshig rnams //
translated: the words ‚Äúsacrifice,‚Äù ‚Äúheaven,‚Äù and so on

original: tshad ma yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: tshad ma yod pa ma yin te //
translated: are not valid cognitions,

original: rig byed phyogs gcig gyur pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rig byed phyogs gcig gyur pa'i phyir //
translated: because they are a part of the Vedas,

original: kun mkhyen yod pa'i tshig bzhin no //
analyzed: kun mkhyen yod pa'i tshig bzhin no //
translated: like the words of one who is omniscient.üîΩIf you say that the words ‚Äúfire‚Äù and so on

original: gal te me sogs yod tshig dang // rig byed tshad ma'ang de yod de //
analyzed: gal te me sogs yod tshig dang // rig byed tshad ma'ang de yod de //
translated: and the Vedas are valid cognitions because they exist,

original: rig byed yan lag gyur ba'i phyir //üîΩme @189a * //
analyzed: rig byed yan lag gyur ba'i phyir // me @189a * //
translated: then because they are a part of the Vedas,üîΩthe words ‚Äúburn‚Äù and so on

original: bzhin sreg sogs tshig bzhin na //
analyzed: bzhin sreg sogs tshig bzhin na //
translated: are like the word ‚Äúfire.‚Äù

original: de yang kun la rung pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yang kun la rung pa'i phyir //
translated: And because they are all suitable,

original: don gcig nges la dbang phyug min //
analyzed: don gcig nges la dbang phyug min //
translated: But it is not the case that there is one God who is the creator of all.

original: de phyir brjod 'dod sgra rnams ni //
analyzed: de phyir brjod 'dod sgra rnams ni //
translated: Therefore, the sounds that we wish to express

original: don gcig gnas pa'i rgyu yin no //üîΩdon gang brjod par 'dod pa la //
analyzed: don gcig gnas pa'i rgyu yin no // don gang brjod par 'dod pa la //
translated: Are the cause for the establishment of a single meaning.

original: mi yis sgra de brjod pa ni //üîΩde nyid sgra de'i brjod bya zhes //
analyzed: mi yis sgra de brjod pa ni // de nyid sgra de'i brjod bya zhes //
translated: The sound that a person uttersüîΩIn order to express a certain meaning

original: mngon par brjod par bya ba yin //
analyzed: mngon par brjod par bya ba yin //
translated: Is the means of expression for that meaning.

original: de yang brda las shes bya ste //üîΩde phyir gang gis bsngags brjod dang // mchod sbyin snyan ngag rig byed byas //
analyzed: de yang brda las shes bya ste // de phyir gang gis bsngags brjod dang // mchod sbyin snyan ngag rig byed byas //
translated: This is known through convention.üîΩTherefore, there are some who are praised

original: shes mthu ldan pa 'ga' yod do //
analyzed: shes mthu ldan pa 'ga' yod do //
translated: For their composition of hymns, sacrifices, and the Vedas.

original: gal te byed po shes ldan na //
analyzed: gal te byed po shes ldan na //
translated: If the creator were omniscient,

original: ji ltar bdag la sogs pa bstan //
analyzed: ji ltar bdag la sogs pa bstan //
translated: How could he have taught the self and so on?

original: bdag med kho na zhes bshad pa //
analyzed: bdag med kho na zhes bshad pa //
translated: It has been explained that there is no self at all,

original: de ni gzhan du mi smra'o //
analyzed: de ni gzhan du mi smra'o //
translated: But this is not what others say.

original: de lta 'ang gzhan don gnyer ba ni //
analyzed: de lta 'ang gzhan don gnyer ba ni //
translated: Nevertheless, some who strive for the welfare of others

original: 'ga' zhig nyan pa po la ltos //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig nyan pa po la ltos //
translated: Do look to the listeners.

original: dgongs pa'i dbang gis 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: dgongs pa'i dbang gis 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: Through the power of their intention,

original: de ni gzhan du ston par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni gzhan du ston par 'gyur //
translated: They will teach this in a different way.

original: tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sems can ni //
analyzed: tha snyad 'dogs pa'i sems can ni //
translated: The beings who are to be trained

original: bsam pa sna tshogs sang bas na /
analyzed: bsam pa sna tshogs sang bas na /
translated: Because of the variety of thoughts,

original: de phyir de yi bsam pa yang //
analyzed: de phyir de yi bsam pa yang //
translated: therefore, his thoughts

original: bdag 'dras shes par mi nus so //
analyzed: bdag 'dras shes par mi nus so //
translated: cannot be known by the likes of me.

original: yang na sems rgyun la dgongs nas //üîΩlog pa'i lta ba yongs sdong ba'i //
analyzed: yang na sems rgyun la dgongs nas // log pa'i lta ba yongs sdong ba'i //
translated: Or, intending the continuum of mind,üîΩthe fruit of the destruction of

original: 'bras bu ster par 'gyur ba ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu ster par 'gyur ba ni //
translated: the wrong views

original: de ni sems can ston pa yan //
analyzed: de ni sems can ston pa yan //
translated: is the teaching of sentient beings.

original: rig byed mchod sbyin las la ni //
analyzed: rig byed mchod sbyin las la ni //
translated: In the Vedas, sacrifices, and actions,üîΩwhatever is explained, such as killing,

original: srog gcod la sogs gang bshad dang // chog la ni mngon spyod sogs //
analyzed: srog gcod la sogs gang bshad dang // chog la ni mngon spyod sogs //
translated: and in the rites, such as black magic,

original: ma bgrungs sems can gnod byed pa //
analyzed: ma bgrungs sems can gnod byed pa //
translated: harming sentient beings who are not trained,

original: de dag don byed la ltos nas //
analyzed: de dag don byed la ltos nas //
translated: in dependence on those who benefit,

original: 'ga' zhig gis ni yi rang ste //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis ni yi rang ste //
translated: some rejoice.

original: dper na yul 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: dper na yul 'khor bsrung ba'i phyir //
translated: For example, in order to protect the country and subjects,

original: sdang ba'i sems can btang ba bzhin //üîΩyang na nga rgyal can gyi mi //
analyzed: sdang ba'i sems can btang ba bzhin // yang na nga rgyal can gyi mi //
translated: one should abandon hateful sentient beings.üîΩOr, some who are proud

original: 'ga' zhig gis ni ched du bstan //üîΩcho ga gzhan gyis mnyes pa yi //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gis ni ched du bstan // cho ga gzhan gyis mnyes pa yi //

original: lha rnams gsol ba'i las byed do //
analyzed: lha rnams gsol ba'i las byed do //
translated: perform the rite of supplication.

original: yang na sngon las rnam smin gyis //
analyzed: yang na sngon las rnam smin gyis //
translated: Or, by the ripening of former karma,

original: de ni mthu dang ldan pas na //
analyzed: de ni mthu dang ldan pas na //
translated: that one is powerful.

original: gang zhig srog gcod byas na yang //
analyzed: gang zhig srog gcod byas na yang //
translated: Even if someone were to kill him,

original: mthu bas nyams par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsngags sman gdon 'dre'i mthu la sogs //
analyzed: mthu bas nyams par mi 'gyur ro // sngags sman gdon 'dre'i mthu la sogs //
translated: his power would not diminish.

original: rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir //

original: de shes skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung //
analyzed: de shes skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung //
translated: some people who know this

original: mi shes phyir na ji ltar ston //üîΩ'on te rang gi blos brtags nas //
analyzed: mi shes phyir na ji ltar ston // 'on te rang gi blos brtags nas //
translated: will appear, but how can they teach it to the ignorant?üîΩOr if someone imagines it on his own

original: 'ga' yis de ni rab bstan te //
analyzed: 'ga' yis de ni rab bstan te //
translated: and teaches it,üîΩhow can it be established as scripture

original: 'jig rten 'di na de tshun chad //üîΩlung ni rab tu gnas she na //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di na de tshun chad // lung ni rab tu gnas she na //
translated: in this world after that time?

original: de rigs ma yin gdon 'dre @189b dang // gsang sngags ched dpyad rigs pa rnams //üîΩming tsam gyis ni ji ltar yang //
analyzed: de rigs ma yin gdon 'dre @189b dang // gsang sngags ched dpyad rigs pa rnams // ming tsam gyis ni ji ltar yang //

original: shes par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: cannot be known in any way just by the name.üîΩEven if the wise strive

original: chags la sogs dang 'brel pa ni //üîΩmkhas la mngon par brtson yang ni //üîΩgnod dang gsang sngags mthu yis ni //
analyzed: chags la sogs dang 'brel pa ni // mkhas la mngon par brtson yang ni // gnod dang gsang sngags mthu yis ni //
translated: to connect with desire and so forth,üîΩthey have no power to know

original: rnam pa kun du shes dbang med //üîΩde phyir gang gis lung bstan nas //
analyzed: rnam pa kun du shes dbang med // de phyir gang gis lung bstan nas //
translated: harm and the power of mantras in any way.üîΩTherefore, by whom can knowledge be produced

original: da dung shes pa skye 'gyur ba //
analyzed: da dung shes pa skye 'gyur ba //
translated: through a prediction?

original: mngon sum ma yin mthong ba yi //
analyzed: mngon sum ma yin mthong ba yi //
translated: There is a person who sees what is not manifest,

original: 'jig par byed pa'i skyes bu yod //
analyzed: 'jig par byed pa'i skyes bu yod //
